sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import emailjs from 'emailjs-com' const contacts = () => { function sendEmail(e){ e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm("service_8tq0ofv","template_1rfewu4",e.target,"user_9Sn4N8cXUc9YonvDO8gOv") .then(res=>{ console.log(res); }).catch(err=>console.log(err)); } return (

Contact us

Do you have any questions? Please do not hesitate to contact us directly. Our team will come back to you within a matter of hours to help you.

Send

  • San Francisco, CA 94126, USA

  • + 01 234 567 89

  • contact@mdbootstrap.com

) } export default contacts
